title: Aurelion sol
body: How does it feel to play him? Is he cool?

replies.body:
Most people don't feel that he is as imposing as is personality implies. He is immobile, and much of his damage lies in his passive, which overall makes for a fairly low-octane champ. He also has a high skill floor, making him seem weak to players just picking him up. The multitude of nerfs after release didn't help this either. 

He is difficult and not very flashing, but certainly unique and rewards mastery of his mechanics.
